title: directory
description: The Directory Object represents the properties common to a file system directory.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `directory`.

path.description: Specifies the path, as originally observed, to the directory on the file system.

path_enc.description: Specifies the observed encoding for the path.

created.description: Specifies the date/time the directory was created.

modified.description: Specifies the date/time the directory was last written to/modified.

accessed.description: Specifies the date/time the directory was last accessed.

contains_refs.description: Specifies a list of references to other File and/or Directory Objects contained within the directory.
